page.title: 17Winchfield Area - Recreation
page.content: The{Hart Leisure Centre}(opened 1975) falls within the block & is shared by the comprehensive school. It has 2 large sports halls, 7 squash courts, fitness room, games room, changing rooms, licensed bar, childrens area & an outdoor petanque pitch. Apart from swimming most sports are catered for. There are regular competitions, tour- -naments & special events & 4000 mem- -bers have enrolled in the last 18 months. The{Basingstoke Canal}is used by canoeists, boat owners & fishermen & provides scenic walks. The area is riddled with{footpaths}for the ardent hiker &{bridleways}for the many local horse owners. Winchfield no longer has a sports ground or children's playground.{Cricket}is played on the ground behind the Barley Mow.For many local people, drinking in one of the 3 pubs is the main form of recreation!
